title: 为什么我服务器的创世神不能在地皮使用？
author: MC_LengGuang
txt_content:
RT

我在地皮输入//set  没有用
在主世界又有用.

求解

replies.author: qq200877776
replies.txt_content: 先输入指令/plotme weanywhere 在用WE(创世神)

replies.author: WSCAOGENG
replies.txt_content:
地皮世界创世神！
1.用木斧头勾画地了吗？
2.有没有使用在地皮框内？

replies.author: 部落领袖
replies.txt_content: 废话= = 创世神默认是不能在 不是你的地皮使用的！

replies.author: MC_LengGuang
replies.txt_content:
部落领袖 发表于 2015-2-11 17:25
废话= = 创世神默认是不能在 不是你的地皮使用的！
如何设置？#
# WorldEdit's configuration file
#
# About editing this file:
# - DO NOT USE TABS. You MUST use spaces or Bukkit will complain. If
#   you use an editor like Notepad++ (recommended for Windows users), you
#   must configure it to "replace tabs with spaces." In Notepad++, this can
#   be changed in Settings > Preferences > Language Menu.
# - Don't get rid of the indents. They are indented so some entries are
#   in categories (like "max-blocks-changed" is in the "limits"
#   category.
# - If you want to check the format of this file before putting it
#   into WorldEdit, paste it into http://yaml-online-parser.appspot.com/
#   and see if it gives "ERROR:".
# - Lines starting with # are commentsand so they are ignored.
#

limits:
    allow-extra-data-values: false
    max-blocks-changed:
        default: -1
        maximum: -1
    max-polygonal-points:
        default: -1
        maximum: 20
    max-radius: -1
    max-super-pickaxe-size: 5
    max-brush-radius: 5
    butcher-radius:
        default: -1
        maximum: -1
    disallowed-blocks: [6, 7, 14, 15, 16, 26, 27, 28, 29, 39, 31, 32, 33, 34, 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 46, 50, 51, 56, 59, 69, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 81, 83]

use-inventory:
    enable: false
    allow-override: true
    creative-mode-overrides: false

logging:
    log-commands: false
    file: worldedit.log

super-pickaxe:
    drop-items: true
    many-drop-items: false

snapshots:
    directory:

navigation-wand:
    item: 345
    max-distance: 100

scripting:
    timeout: 3000
    dir: craftscripts

saving:
    dir: schematics

files:
    allow-symbolic-links: false

history:
    size: 15
    expiration: 10

wand-item: 271
shell-save-type:
no-double-slash: false
no-op-permissions: false
debug: false复制代码

我的配置文件

replies.author: 部落领袖
replies.txt_content:
1447375349 发表于 2015-2-11 17:33
如何设置？

我的配置文件
第二行就写了。WE就是创世神

replies.author: xt00
replies.txt_content:
亲，在地皮世界使用we是要先输入一个指令的
/plotme weanywhere
输入后就可以在地皮世界使用创世神插件了哦
